name: Trunet IRCD
short_description: Trunet IRCD will have all the standard features such as chanserv, memoserv, operserv, nickserv and statserv. Our goal is to make an IRCD to run on WinNT/Win2k/WinXP while keeping power and stability at a level to allow 20,000 plus users on concurrent conn
